mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO ENCRYPTED_LOCATION ( encrypted_latitude, encrypted_longitude, heading, altitude, speed, occur_dt, route_dir, last_stop_id, last_stop_seq, last_stop_dist, origin_accum_dist ) VALUES ( #{item.encryptedLatitude}, #{item.encryptedLongitude}, #{item.heading}, #{item.altitude}, #{item.speed}, #{item.occurDt}, #{item.routeDir}, #{item.lastStopId}, #{item.lastStopSeq}, #{item.lastStopDist}, #{item.originAccumDist} )
